alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 12:33PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern St. Lucie County through 100 PM EDT... At 1232 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Port Saint Lucie River Park, or near White City, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Fort Pierce, Stuart, White City and Jensen Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland St. Lucie
